title: Protocol Definition Schema
description: Schema for defining and standardizing integrity protocols used by the Protocol Integrity Manager (PIM), enabling systematic versioning and execution by the PIM engine.

protocol_id.description: Unique identifier for the protocol (e.g., GAX_III).

security_level.description: The security classification of the protocol.

required_steps.description: Ordered list of verification steps or sub-routines required by the protocol execution wrapper.

verifier_module.description: Reference to the executable module path/name/version.
